```{r setup}
library(MSB104TimeSeriesSME)
library(COVID19)
library(dplyr) 
library(lubridate) 
library(zoo)
```

```{r}
all_data <- COVID19::covid19(verbose = F)
unique(all_data$id)
sel_cou <- c('NOR','ITA','SWE','GBR','ISR','FIN','CZE','ESP','USA','CAN','SVK','IND') 

COVID19 <- all_data %>% dplyr::filter(id%in%sel_cou)
```
